Field Detail

MODULE_NAMES

public static final java.lang.String MODULE_NAMES
This is name of the property that specifies the qualified names of all the modules from which to build the Registry. The names are relative to the classpath. Module names are separated by commas and may be optionally enclosed in quotes (").
